LockRoI.short_help: Locks or unlocks the View RoI

ShowRoI.short_help: Enables or disables drawing the current View RoI rectangle

EnableRoI.short_help: Enables or disables the current View RoI

ExportTo3DLUT.short_help: Exports the current LUTs to a 3D LUT file
usage: boolean, string :ExportTo3DLUT([string pathname], [number cubesize], [number precision], [number rangemin], [number rangemax])
ExportTo3DLUT.description:
Exports a 3D LUT with cubesize x cubesize x cubesize entries (default 33x33x33).
Passing nil or no pathname displays a dialog to the user.
For precision, pass 1 for uint8, 2 for uint16 or 9 for float32 (default float32).
For HDR LUTs, pass rangemin/rangemax (default is 0.0 to 1.0).
Returns: boolean success, and the saved LUT's filename.

SaveLUTFile.short_help: Saves current LUTs into a .viewlut file

LoadLUTFile.short_help: Loads a LUT file, setting or LUT plugin ID into the View LUT

LoadLUTAction.short_help: Used by the Action system to load a LUT file into the View LUT

ShowLUTEditor.short_help: Pops up the Editor window for the current View LUT

IsLUTEnabled.short_help: Returns true if the current View LUT is enabled

EnableLUT.short_help: Enables or disables the current View LUT

ShowDoD.short_help: Enables or disables drawing the current View DoD rectangle

SetRoI.short_help: Sets the current View RoI region

DragRoI.short_help: Lets the user drag out an RoI rectangle
